Welcome to your Flux CMS installation

This is now your very own Flux CMS installation.

You can now log in to the admin interface and administrate your installation

If you need help, you can look in different places:

  • The Getting Started with Flux CMS Guide, giving you an overview of what you can do with Flux CMS and how you do that.
  • Documentation to Flux CMS for endusers (also in german)
  • The Freeflux Forum
  • The Flux CMS Developement Blog
  • The Flux CMS Wiki
  • Our mailinglist and further support places, like IRC
  • The Freeflux Help Page, all the links from above and more

But now, we hope you enjoy Flux CMS and we'd really like to hear from you what you think about it .

The Bitflux Team
